title: Painting of Joseph II plowing fields

content.question: The painting above depicts the Austrian Emperor Joseph II (1780-1790) as

choices.label: a democratic representative of the common people
an Enlightened monarch interested in methods of improving productivity
the "first servant of the state" who encouraged Enlightenment philosophes
an advocate of the reeducation of the aristocracy through forced agricultural labor

content.answer: an Enlightened monarch interested in methods of improving productivity

topic.text: 4.6: Enlightened and Other Approaches to Power

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
